text: same sex marriage is blocked the NFL
settlement and Beethoven on the auction
block good evening this is the New York
Times minute for the last two weeks
hundreds of gay and lesbian couples wed
in Utah but today the Supreme Court
ordered a halt to the marriages the case
and the legality of those marriages now
heads to a federal appeals court in
Denver the NFL and lawyers for more than
4,000 retired players officially filed a
760 million dollar settlement today the
latest attempt to end a long-running
concussion lawsuit if it's approved the
NFL will avoid legal liability and
retired players will receive
compensation based on their medical
condition their age a number of seasons
played and a glimpse into Beethoven's
creative process goes on sale this page
ripped out from Beethoven's sketchbook
is expected to fetch more than two
hundred thousand dollars at an auction
next week the composer carried this
piece of paper around with them and it's
filled with ideas for the missus alumnus
one of his greatest works
